ability.name: Levitation Field
ability.flavor: You manipulate the air around your allies so they can move as freely through the sky as you can.

effects.effect: Each target can fly until the start of your next turn, and can immediately shift up to their speed. You can also shift up to your speed. While flying, a target's stability is reduced to 0 and can't be increased.
The effects last for 1 hour instead.
